author: Alexandra Wolfe
title: Ray Allenâ€™s Life After the NBA
text:
Though he retired four years ago, Ray Allen is still a big name in the National Basketball Association: He holds the record for scoring the most 3-point field goals, and he helped both the Boston Celtics and the Miami Heat win NBA championships. A 10-time All-Star during his 18 years in the league, he also won an Olympic gold medal.
These days, Mr. Allen, 42, is living in Coral Gables, Fla., helping his wife, Shannon, to expand their organic fast-food restaurant chain, Grown, which has three locations in Florida and Connecticut....
